metadata.description: Comprehensive Claude Code marketplace with specialized toolkits for productivity, development, analytics, documents, e-commerce, and AI integrations - now featuring complete GTM, GA4, Shopify, and Google Automation suites

plugins.name: productivity-toolkit
plugins.description: Essential productivity suite with planning and workflow tools: 1 documentation agent + 11 powerful commands (ultra-think, planning, PRPs, containerize, etc.) + 2 utility skills (PRP generator, timezone tools)

plugins.name: developer-toolkit
plugins.description: Complete development toolkit: 2 expert agents (fullstack developer, validation gates) + 3 skills (git commit helper, webapp testing, devtools setup) + 7 MCP integrations (Chrome DevTools, Playwright, Cloudflare docs, Microsoft docs, Firecrawl, Context7, Serena AI)

plugins.name: documents-toolkit
plugins.description: Professional document processing suite: 3 comprehensive skills for Word (.docx), Excel (.xlsx), and PDF files - create, edit, analyze, and process documents with advanced features like tracked changes, forms, tables, OCR, and formulas

plugins.name: claudecode-toolkit
plugins.description: Meta toolkit for Claude Code itself: skill-creator guide helps you build effective skills and extend Claude's capabilities

plugins.name: finance-toolkit
plugins.description: Financial market data integrations: 2 MCP servers providing real-time stock market data (AlphaVantage) and cryptocurrency data (CoinGecko)

plugins.name: ai-toolkit
plugins.description: AI integration toolkit: 2 MCP servers connecting to Gemini AI and Perplexity for enhanced AI capabilities and search

plugins.name: gtm-suite
plugins.description: Complete Google Tag Manager suite with 10 specialized skills covering setup, configuration, implementation, debugging, and best practices. Includes GTM fundamentals, tags, triggers, variables, data layer architecture, debugging tools, custom templates, and API automation for comprehensive GTM mastery.

plugins.name: ga-suite
plugins.description: Comprehensive Google Analytics 4 suite with 15 specialized skills covering complete GA4 implementation from property setup to BigQuery integration. Includes events, user tracking, e-commerce, custom dimensions, audiences, privacy compliance, reporting, Measurement Protocol, and GTM integration for full GA4 expertise.

plugins.name: shopify-developer
plugins.description: Professional Shopify development toolkit with 6 specialized skills covering Liquid templating, theme development, API integration (GraphQL/REST), custom app development, performance optimization, and debugging. Complete solution for building custom themes, headless storefronts, and Shopify apps.

plugins.name: google-apps-ads-script
plugins.description: Comprehensive automation toolkit with 2 specialized skills: Google Apps Script for Workspace automation (Sheets, Docs, Gmail, Drive, Calendar) and Google Ads Scripts for campaign automation, bidding strategies, and reporting. Perfect for marketers and automation engineers.

plugins.name: mcp-fetch
plugins.description: Web content fetching and HTTP requests

plugins.name: mcp-mikrotik
plugins.description: MikroTik router management and network automation

plugins.name: mcp-open-meteo
plugins.description: Weather and climate data (no API key required)
